entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late this evening then periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 23.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 23. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 33 in the evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
